title: Scarlet
description:
Drugs, werewolves, and yuri. A gaslamp fantasy about a narcotics officer and her Red Riding Hood wolf-demon companion, but their relationship might be more sinister than what meets the eye.

Monthly.

[url=https://twitter.com/yuinochiri04]Author's Twitter[/url]

matches.title: Do You Think Someone Like You Could Defeat the Demon Lord?
